title: Login not working
description: User reports an issue with the login page. Credentials are correct but login fails.

title: Page crashes on submit
description: Form submission on checkout causes a page crash intermittently.

title: User cannot reset password
description: Reset password form gives an error saying 'token expired'.

title: API returns 500 error
description: Backend API endpoint /v1/orders returns a 500 error when queried with date range.

title: UI layout broken on mobile
description: Layout of the main dashboard looks scrambled when viewed on iPhone.

title: Unable to upload file
description: Users report being unable to upload profile pictures.

title: Notification emails not sent
description: Expected notification emails for comments are not being sent.

title: Button not responding
description: The 'Submit' button on the feedback form does not respond to clicks.

title: Search results incorrect
description: Search function returns results unrelated to query terms.

title: Data export missing fields
description: Exported CSV does not include the 'email' and 'status' fields.

title: Slow page load
description: Reports of the analytics page taking over 10 seconds to load.

title: Date picker not working
description: Calendar widget does not let users select future dates.

title: Forgot password not triggering email
description: Forgot password form seems to accept input but no email is received.

title: Profile update fails
description: Editing the user profile causes the server to respond with 400 error.

title: New user not showing in list
description: Newly registered users are not appearing in the admin dashboard.

title: Settings not saving
description: Changes in settings menu do not persist after reload.

title: Graph not rendering
description: Graphs on the reporting tab are blank or show incorrect data.

title: Dark mode broken
description: Dark mode toggle causes colors to invert incorrectly.

title: Session times out too quickly
description: Sessions time out in less than 5 minutes even when active.

title: Dropdown overlaps text
description: Dropdown menu in the header overlaps with page content below.

title: File server down! ?
description: No access to any shared folders across the network!

comments.content: Power supply dead. Replacement on route. ETA 3 hours.
Suggested backup server going forward and also recommended cloud based backup.
